channel.title: root sounds news
channel.description: New releases and announcements from root-sounds

item.title: root sounds releases Hammered Dulcimer
item.description: root-sounds has released Hammered Dulcimer. The sound of the dulcimer inspires with its piercing attacks and long decays that can turn simple harmonic rhythms into clusters.

item.title: root sounds releases Synclavier
item.description: root-sounds has released Synclavier, a library that captures the sound of the first commercially available digital synthesizer ever made.

item.title: root sounds releases Creaks 'n Freaks
item.description: root-sounds has released Creaks 'n Freaks, a hair raising collection of 24bit atrocities that escaped the prison of your keyboard to chop your imagination into bloody little slices.

item.title: root sounds releases Phantom Organ
item.description: root-sounds has released Phantom Organ, a very neglected instrument. With a little loving sampling care, this has turned into quite a unique instrument. And it's free!

item.title: root sounds releases True Mallets bundle
item.description: root-sounds has released the Concert Marimba and Deep Vibes sample libraries in a True Mallets bundle at a 25% discount. This is a great way to expand your percussion library with deep sampled mallet instruments.
